downloadTitle: Windows Server 2012 OEM Appliance OOBE Four-Node Cluster Setup Guide
downloadDescription: Setup guide for extending the OEM Appliance OOBE for Windows Server 2012 to support a 4-node cluster or cluster-in-a-box, and deploy an HA Active Directory domain controller.
detailsSection: This guide helps IT professionals extend the OEM Appliance OOBE and Initial Configuration Tasks (ICT) for Windows Server 2012 or Windows Storage Server 2012 to support a 4-node cluster or cluster-in-a-box configuration, and deploy a highly available Active Directory domain controller for use with the appliance.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button to open or save the file.

relatedResourcesSection.title: windows Storage Server 2012 Planning and Deployment
